◆ PWM_SetDutyCycle()

void PWM_SetDutyCycle ( uint16_t  dutyCycle_perm)

Set the duty cycle of the PWM (currently only channel 1A)

Duty cycle values that are out of the range that is supported are limited to the threshold values.

Parameters
[in]dutyCycle_permduty cycle in permill

Definition at line 153 of file pwm.c.

◆ PWM_StartPwm()

void PWM_StartPwm ( void  )

Start the PWM (starts all configured ePWM channels)

In order for this function to work, it is absolutely necessary that etpwmInit() is called first.
